title: Error Starting doccano_frontend container when trying to set up (development) environment with docker-compose
body:
### System information
- **Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS**:

### Describe the problem
The frontend docker container fails to start when trying to set up doccano for local development environment. 
It seems related to older issues of this kind ("Cannot find module 'eslint-plugin-nuxt'"), but applying those fixes didn't work for me, or I might miss something obvious here.

Thank for your help. 

Using `docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up`:

### Source code / logs
```

Creating doccano_backend_1  ... done
Creating doccano_frontend_1 ... done
```
